properties.areaDesc: North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 5:42PM PST until January 21 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches, with locally higher amounts up to 10 inches above 6000
feet. Winds gusting to around 35 to 50 mph.

* WHERE...North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County. This
includes areas south of Tennant and the City of Pondosa.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 2 PM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute. Snow combined
with gusty winds could bring down tree branches.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
* Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination.

* Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and
limited visibilities.

* See http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions.

* A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow
will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 2 PM PST TUESDAY
